description:
It's Official: CBS All Access Orders 'Good Wife' Spinoff.CBS视频网站正式预定《傲骨贤妻》衍生剧。
 
Creators Robert and Michelle King are set to co-write the first episode but will not run the series. In addition to Baranski and Jumbo, the new series will introduce new characters and pick up one year after the events of The Good Wife finale.《傲骨贤妻》制作人金氏夫妇将会联手编写第一集，但不是整部剧。除了沿用了原班人马中的克里斯汀·芭伦斯基（饰演Diane）和库什（饰演Lucca），新剧将会引进新的角色并在《傲骨贤妻》季终的一年后开始选角。
 
“The quality of The Good Wife has always rivaled anything on television and were excited to tell more stories with some of the brilliant characters Robert and Michelle King created,” CBS Television Studios president David Stapf said in a statement. CBS制作方主管在声明中说到“《傲骨贤妻》的高品质在电视行业是首屈一指的，能沿用金氏夫妇创造出的部分优秀角色，为大家呈现更多精彩的故事，这是非常令人激动的” 。
